text: The Rezvani Vengeance is a full-size off-road SUV made by Rezvani since 2022. == History and Features == In October 2022 Rezvani revealed the Vengeance that is based on the Cadillac Escalade. The SUV has military styling and was designed by Milen Ivanov, a digital artist that used to design vehicles in video games. He designed the Vengeance to look like a vehicle from a video game. Some things from the SUV like the dashboard are from the Cadillac Escalade. It also has a three-row seating. The vehicle has a 6.2 liter V8 petrol engine and a 3.0 liter diesel engine with a 10-speed automatic transmission that is also from the Escalade. == Markets == The Rezvani Vengeance is sold only in The United States. It has a price of 285,000 US$. With all the options, the price increases to 782,250 US$. == References == Category:Sport utility vehicles Vengeance Category:2020s automobiles
title: Rezvani Vengeance
